title: OOM Cardio ECG Platform
description: Continuous ECG ingestion, arrhythmia detection, and clinician dashboards with high-availability nodes.
about: OOM Cardio is a regulated cardiac diagnostics platform that streams millions of ECG samples per hour. It provides real-time clinician dashboards, annotation workflows, and device fleet telemetry.
responsibilities: Architected ingestion services that scaled to 120M+ samples/day using BullMQ workers.
Implemented role-based dashboards with live ECG charts and FDA-compliant audit logs.
Deployed HA infrastructure across AWS Fargate, RDS, and scalable Redis clusters.

title: QMS & ERP Medical Suite
description: Unified QMS, ERP, and CAPA automation for regulated medical manufacturing teams.
about: A modular suite that digitizes ISO13485 workflows, inventory, CAPA, and supplier quality tracking.
responsibilities: Modeled traceable workflows connecting engineering change orders to shop-floor execution.
Built PDF automation, digital signatures, and validation-ready audit logs.
Integrated Azure AD SSO with least-privilege RBAC policies.

title: Wi-Fi Device Sync Manager (ESP32)
description: Provisioning and OTA orchestration for ESP32 fleets in surgical environments.
about: Managed Wi-Fi credential rotation, OTA updates, and telemetry streaming for hospital device fleets.
responsibilities: Designed secure provisioning handshake with short-lived credentials and Just-In-Time provisioning.
Built OTA control plane with phased rollouts and health monitoring dashboards.
Implemented GraphQL APIs powering technician tablet apps for low-friction installs.

title: BLE Data Transfer App (Android/iOS)
description: Cross-platform clinical mobile app that syncs BLE vitals into EHR integrations.
about: Offline-first mobile experiences that pair with medical sensors and push curated vitals into EHRs.
responsibilities: Implemented BLE command queue with retries and error heuristics for OR-grade reliability.
Created clinician-ready UI with patient-safe workflows and data validation.
Mapped vitals flows into FHIR bundles consumed by Epic/Cerner integrations.

title: Arrhythmia Worker Pipeline (Node + BullMQ)
description: Distributed workers that process ECG windows and trigger automated cardiologist alerts.
about: Streamlines arrhythmia detection with deterministic queues, GPU scoring, and smart alerting.
responsibilities: Optimized GPU inference batching and fallback CPU modes for 4x throughput.
Implemented cardiologist notification workflows with SLA enforcement.
Instrumented pipeline metrics with Grafana boards for regulatory readiness.
